questionTitle: I left the coffee for a minute to cool because it was ____ hot to drink.
He wasn't strong ____ to lift that heavy box.
There aren't ____ policemen in our town.
Do you have ____ information to help me with this problem?
It is ____ difficult to do for a little child.
I do not have ____ much time to prepare dinner.
I didn't buy the car because it was ____ expensive.
He didn't work hard ____ to pass the exam.
My mum can't sleep because she drinks ____ much coffee.
She isn't old ____ to start driving.
